long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
'Open link in small window.' is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your browsing experience by letting you open links in a small pop-up window instead of a full tab. With just a right-click, you can open any link in a compact window, positioned conveniently on the screen, helping you keep your workflow organized without cluttering your browser tabs.

Learn more here: https://bit.ly/openlinkinsmallwindowblog

Why Install This Extension?

Improve Your Productivity: Stop juggling multiple tabs. When you want to quickly view a link, this extension opens it in a small, focused window, so you donâ€™t lose track of your main task.

Seamless Multitasking: View links side-by-side with your current content. Whether you're doing research, referencing materials, or watching videos, this extension makes it easy to manage secondary content.

Customizable Window Positioning: The small window can open on the right side of your screen, perfect for multitaskers who prefer keeping their workspace organized. No more losing windows behind your main application.

Reduce Browser Clutter: Say goodbye to tab overload! The small pop-up window ensures that your browsing stays organized and efficient by keeping links separate from your main window.

Lightweight and Easy to Use: No complicated settings. Just install, right-click, and enjoy a smoother browsing experience.
